thread.title: Watch Carrie Underwood Duet With Son Isaiah on 'Jesus Loves Me'
thread.title_full: Watch Carrie Underwood Duet With Son Isaiah on 'Jesus Loves Me'

author: Jillian Frankel
title: Watch Carrie Underwood Duet With Son Isaiah on 'Jesus Loves Me'
text:
COMMENTS Neilson Barnard/NBCUniversal/NBCU Photo Bank via Getty Images Carrie Underwood arrives to the 74th Annual Golden Globe Awards held at the Beverly Hilton Hotel on Jan. 8, 2017 in Beverly Hills, Calif. 
Carrie Underwood showed off her son’s singing skills in an Instagram video Wednesday, a few days before his second birthday. 
The video shows the duo singing “Jesus Loves Me” while Isaiah sits in his car seat and attempts to echo his mom during their drive. Underwood posted the video along with the caption, "Yes, Jesus loves us..." 
Watch the video below:
